effect.scarlet-violet: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is in the first turn of dive, this move will hit with double power.
effect.the-teal-mask: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is in the first turn of dive, this move will hit with double power.
effect.the-indigo-disk: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is in the first turn of dive, this move will hit with double power.

short_effect.scarlet-violet: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dive users.
short_effect.the-teal-mask: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dive users.
short_effect.the-indigo-disk: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dive users.

flavor_text.scarlet-violet: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.
